Reviews.Title: “Not worthy of 3 stars”
Reviews.Author: JollieRockhopper
Reviews.Content: stayed night hotel clode airport favour clean tidy faced directly opposite train station noisy despite hotel empty request change refused furnished entirely ikea beds shower sealant covered mildew recommend 10 euro head breakfast told reception cooked breakfast request met flat refusal mistake imagining eat bread jam provide iwas prevented leaving breakfast aggressive staff shouted grabbed arm plate embarrassed angry paid 10 euros cup coffee concerned hotel reception unmanned 12 midnight leaving overheard guest told wifi access 10 euros hour parking 10 euros night dirty feel unsafe outside night pleasant stay repeat paid 70 euros night feel hotel represent value money nor worthy 3 star status

Reviews.Title: “More than we expected”
Reviews.Author: i-reve
Reviews.Content: modest price paid didnt particular expectations hotel managed pleasant surprise impeccably clean tidy warm bedlinen changed day helpful staff reception appreciated details safe breakfast included price inexpensive supermarket road wasnt smth eat morning city centre sbahn station 1 min excellent value money
